entry.tran: 过分肥胖的；臃肿的；虚胖的
entry.def: If someone is obese, they are extremely fat.

example.ex: The tendency to become obese is at least in part hereditary...
example.tran: 发胖至少有一部分是源于遗传。

example.ex: Obese people tend to have higher blood pressure than lean people.
example.tran: 胖人常常比瘦人血压高。

Sentence.sentence: What do the Rand researchers think of many of the policy measures to control obesity?
The conclusion was that social isolation is statistically as dangerous as high blood pressure, smoking and obesity.

sentences.en: One effect of overeating may be obesity.
Sugar and fat can more easily lead to obesity than some other foods.
sentences.cn: 糖和脂肪比其他食物更容易导致肥胖。
